title: Biden Plans to Bring Back Critical Race Theory
description:
Watch the full episode here:  https://www.lotuseaters.com/the-podcast-of-the-lotus-eaters-episode-1-09-11-20

Biden's manifesto promises to reimpose critical race theory on all federal departments, his campaign seems to promise to make this a priority of his first days in office. 

Find more content at https://www.lotuseaters.com/
